question: What is Panchbhut Game?
answer: It is the tale of five chosen siblings and their quest to manifest the energies of the five elements to become saviours.

question: Is this a PFP project?
answer: No, PFP projects tend to have 1 main character multiplied with hundreds of traits and layers. Panchbhut Game will have 80+ unique characters, where each character will have its own unique traits and layers plus powers to showcase in the Gameplay.

question: Where can I interact with Panchbhut Game NFT collectors & the community?
answer: Discord would be the best place. We do have presence on other socials like Instagram and Tweeter too.

question: Where can I sell my NFTs?
answer: Our Discord community would be best place to connect, grow & find potential collectors.

question: What is the Phase 1?
answer: In phase-1 we will release 5K NFTs.

question: When can I play the Game?
answer: Web based development of the first version of the game will be initiated at around 30% sale (phase-1) and lead time considered to complete is minimum 18 months +.

question: What are 'Members Key Card' NFT? What behaviour do they have?
answer: Unique 'Members Key Card' will be issued to all the existing holders. This will allow them to invite new members to the community during the phase - 2 & 3 sales as we will only allow new users with the key card to join. (This will provide community members the opportunity to participate and benefit from direct sales)

question: When does Phase 2 start?
answer: When we get the 100% sales from Phase-1 (batch of first 5K NFTs)

question: Does each phase have different NFT drop?
What is the Reward Program?
answer: We have introduced a plan for the community to actively engage in the growth and while doing that stand a chance to win some $s and possibly a FREE Genesis Mint. For more details - please see the [Utility & Rewards] section on our discord channel.
